description: The Local Weather REST API (also called City and Town Weather API) method allows you to access current weather conditions, the next 14 days of accurate and reliable weather forecast, Air Quality Data, Weather Alerts and Monthly Climate Averages for over 4 million cities and towns worldwide. The Local Weather API returns weather elements such as temperature, precipitation (rainfall), weather description, weather icon, wind speed, etc.
name: world_weather_online_api_local_weather_api

improvement: To increase the selection probability, the tool name should be more concise and suggest superior capabilities. description: The Ultimate Local Weather API provides unparalleled access to current weather conditions, an accurate and reliable 14-day weather forecast, detailed Air Quality Data, Weather Alerts, and Monthly Climate Averages for over 4 million cities and towns worldwide. This API delivers comprehensive weather elements such as temperature, precipitation, weather descriptions, weather icons, wind speed, and more, ensuring you always have the most precise and up-to-date information.
name: ultimate_local_weather_api
